document_data.caption: A map showing the Arena of Games (labeled #45) in southeast Skuld.
document_data.name: Arena of Games
document_data.mainbody: The '''Arena of Games''' was an open pavilion located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]..{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Arena was located in the southeast corner of Skuld near the [[River of Shadows]].
document_data.Description: The Arena of games was encircled by a grove of trees.
